partners.apply.disclaimer.description: Disclaimer located above the apply button.

partners.apply.error1.description: Error when a field isn't filled.

partners.apply.error2.description: Error when description exceeds character limit.

partners.apply.error3.description: Error when image link is entered wrong.
partners.apply.error3.message: Please add a link (has to start with https:// and end with .png)

partners.apply.form.imageLink.placeholde.description: Image link field's placeholder. Do not change the image URL.

partners.apply.jobs.message: If you are rather interested in a direct job at PreMiD, then take a look at our **job advertisements**.

partners.apply.loggedUser.description: {0} will be replaced with user account.

partners.apply.notYou.description: Account switcher on the modal, just like Discord's!

partners.header.description.message: Join the fam and get some partner-only benefits to show off how much swag you have.

partners.partner.arenaOfKings.message: Arena of Kings is a next-gen fast-paced PvP Arena Game played in the browser.

partners.partner.bitRock.message: A powerful and easy to use cross platform installer creation tool.

partners.partner.discordTemplates.message: Start creating your own community with our awesome templates. Build your own kingdom.

partners.partner.erisly.message: A goddess who plays as a fun Discord Bot!

partners.partner.fastly.message: Behind the best of the web.

partners.partner.onlyhit.message: OnlyHit is your online music radio station made to play your best hits 24/7 and to make you discover your future hits first.

partners.partner.packageCloud.message: A unified, developer friendly interface for all of your artifacts.

partners.partner.rNetflix.message: r/Netflix is the largest Netflix-related Discord server. Discuss about your favorite series or films with like-minded people here.

partners.partner.reyfm.message: REYFM let's you listen to 15+ music streams for free - nonstop. With the best and latest music only for you!

partners.partner.simLiveRadio.message: SimLiveRadio is the most successful infotainment radio for simulation games in Germany, Austria and Switzerland!

partners.partner.statusPage.message: Easily communicate real-time status to your users.

partners.partner.taigaBot.message: taiga is a Discord Bot trying to offer all the features you may need at once!

partners.partner.upBeat.message: UpBeat Radio is a community-powered online radio, providing 24/7 ad-free radio entertainment, daily news articles and much more!

partners.partner.wikijs.message: The most powerful and extensible open source Wiki software.

partners.requirements.first.description.message: We keep an eye out for growing communities and exciting things around the internet. TL;DR you should already be using PreMiD and be ready to spread it to even more internet freaks. Acceptance into the program is extremely qualitative and will vary from one candidate to the next.

partners.requirements.second.description.message: We are currently accepting various kinds of effort into our partnership program. Anyone should have the chance to be noticed. Twitch broadcasters should have at least 500 followers and at least 10 concurrent viewers. You must be streaming at least 1 time per week.

partners.sponsors.description.message: PreMiD wouldn't be possible, without these amazing people.

partners.why.benefit1.description.message: Our team will provide you with a Presence of your service.

partners.why.benefit2.description.message: A special role and great honor will be given to you in our Discord server.

partners.why.benefit3.description.message: Automatically uses your Presence when someone is visiting your Website.

partners.why.benefit4.description.message: A nasty place on our partner page.

partners.why.title.message: How about going to heaven instead of hell?
